name: YodelMeWildfireFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: In an effort to keep British Columbians informed about what is happening with wildfires, floods and other incidents, YodelME created the BC Wildfire App and now provides additional information with the help of Alexa!
